name: urlpattern-polyfill
description: Polyfill for the proposed URLPattern API

scripts.checksize: rollup -c ; cat urlpattern-polyfill.bundled.js | gzip -9 | wc -c ; rm urlpattern-polyfill.bundled.js
scripts.publish-dev: npm test && VERSION=${npm_package_version%-*}-dev.`git rev-parse --short HEAD` && npm version --no-git-tag-version $VERSION && npm publish --tag dev
